definition: portrait (painting, photo etc)/(in a general sense) representation of a person/likeness
one of the twelve animals symbolic of the earthly branches 地支[di4 zhi1]/animal from the Chinese zodiac
Xiao Yang (1938-), president of the PRC Supreme Court 1998-2008
to imitate to perfection/to be remarkably true to life
Frederic Chopin or Fryderyk Franciszek Chopin (1810-1849), Polish pianist and composer
to resemble closely/to be the very image of/to look very much like/to be the spitting image of
birth year as designated by animal symbols (mouse, ox, tiger etc)
to imitate to perfection/to be remarkably true to life

sentences.english: In the evening, he learns Chinese from Lily and Xiao Yang.
sentences.chinese: 到是晚上，他向李莉和肖楊學漢語。

sentences.english: A change came over Cronshaw's placid round face.
sentences.chinese: 克朗肖的平靜的圓臉一下子變了色。

sentences.english: He recollected Cronshaw's whimsical metaphor of the Persian carpet.
sentences.chinese: 他回憶克朗肖經常談起的那個波斯地毯的寓言。

sentences.english: Shoham and Rogers believe that ice provides a perfect explanation.
sentences.chinese: 肖海姆和羅傑斯堅信冰凍是最完美的理由。

sentences.english: Xiao Rongrong to attend to cold indifferent attitude let Chen Ruyue very don't understand.
sentences.chinese: 肖蓉蓉對顧寒冷漠的態度讓陳如月十分不理解。

sentences.english: Around the same time, Dr Xiao applied to be elected to the Chinese Academy of Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，肖博士遞交申請入選爲中國工程院院士。

sentences.english: Alessandra Sensini from Italy took the silver medal and Bryony Shaw from Britain claimed the bronze medal.
sentences.chinese: 意大利森西尼獲得了銀牌，英國的肖獲得了銅牌。

sentences.english: I said that many times that only Aaron can forgive Shawcross.
sentences.chinese: 我說過很多次，唯有讓阿龍自己去原諒肖克洛斯。

sentences.english: “They are betting that there will be great markets for coal in China, ” Mr. Cronshaw said.
sentences.chinese: “它們正在打賭中國的煤炭市場更大，”克朗肖說道。

sentences.english: Xiao is just one of the growing numbers of young loners nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 肖只是如今日益增多的年輕獨行者之一。

sentences.english: Shaw and Fusco followed him to the suburbs, so we're still working on it.
sentences.chinese: 肖和弗斯科跟蹤他到了郊外，還在努力中。

sentences.english: Despite the opportunity, transfers have fallen by half, Mr. Shaw said.
sentences.chinese: 儘管這是機會，但是遷移仍然下跌了一般，肖先生說。

sentences.english: Now how the hell do you ever expect that you'll get laid.
sentences.chinese: 拜託你怎麼能夠肖想要找到人上牀。

sentences.english: Because the hardness is the Shore hardness of Shore, it is therefore not to speak of conversion.
sentences.chinese: 因爲肖氏硬度就是邵氏硬度，故無換算關係可言。

sentences.english: Blanchot's political activities after the war shifted to the left.
sentences.chinese: 戰後，布朗肖的政治活動轉向左翼。

definition: surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
